articles.title: India seeks Australian monoclonal antibodies for Nipah virus treatment - Times of India
articles.description: India is procuring monoclonal antibodies, specifically m102.4, from Australia to potentially treat Nipah virus (NiV) infections in Kerala. Originally developed for Henipavirus, early trials suggest m102.4 may be effective against NiV, a highly fatal
